field.label: Creator(s)
field.hint: Enter the name(s) of the creator(s) of this item.
field.required: You must enter the creator of the item

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Publication Date
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Creation Date
field.hint: Please give the date the item was created. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must choose a revision date.

field.label: Resource Type
field.hint: Select the resource type(s) of the main content of the item (hold Ctrl/Cmd while clicking to select multiple subjects).
field.required: You must choose one or multiple resource types

field.label: Subject
field.hint: Please select a subject/tag that describes the primary topic for this item.

field.label: Summary
field.hint: A short one line summary of what this item contains.

field.label: Prerequisite Knowledge
field.hint: Please list one prerequisite at a time (press the "Add More" button to add more entries).
field.required: Please enter prerequisite knowledges for this item.

field.label: Learning Objectives
field.hint: Please list one objective at a time (press the "Add More" button to add more entries).
field.required: Please enter learning objectives for this item.

field.label: Related Materials
field.hint: Please list one related material at a time (press the "Add More" button to add more entries).

field.label: Suggested Uses, Tips and Discoveries
field.hint: Information that will help others to use this material. Also includes lessons you've learned from using this material in practice, e.g.: what worked, what didn't, what was particularly difficult, etc.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item.
